text: jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne hijarat kee aur allaah ke maarg mein apane maalon aur apanee jaanon ke saath jihaad kiya aur jin logon ne unhen sharan dee aur sahaayata kee, vahee log paraspar ek-doosare ke sanrakshak mitr hai. rahe ve log jo eemaan lae, kintu unhonne hijarat nahin kee, unase tumhaara sanrakshan aur mitrata ka koee sambandh nahin hai, jab tak ki ve hijarat na karen, kintu yadi ve dharm ke maamale mein tumase sahaayata maange to tumapar anivaary hai ki sahaayata karo, sivaay isake ki sahaayata kisee aisee qaum ke muqaabale mein ho jisase tumhaaree koee sandhi ho. tum jo kuchh karate ho allaah use dekhata hai
